summary: Over powered god items. Kinda cool, not too lore friendly though. Has no dependancies that I\'m aware of; dlc, skse, other mods or otherwise.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod uploaded, anywhere - ever.

It includes occult themes, blood and gore
and most importantly - poor taste. If you
loath any of these things, please don\'t
read any further

**************************************************************
In short (for those who don\'t like to read):

Just drop the file in your Data folder or
hopefully NMM will do it for you. If you have
or as soon as you commit murder, the first
item will be available to be crafted under
the Daedric smithing category. No preks
required. After you make the first item, all
you need is it equipped and 1000 human
skulls to craft the second item the same way.

Or use your console - \"help vita\" will show
you the item number for the first one,
\"help brarum\" will show you the second one.
Then type in \"player.additem XXXXXXXX 1\" to
get that item. (Gotta do it twice to get both.
There is a space between the m of additem
and the first number of the item code, then
another space between the last number of
the item code and the 1 (that\'s how many of
the item you want). No quotations.
**************************************************************

Get bored and frustrated with the daily
Skyrim grind? Those pesky couriers and rude
townsfolk just rub you the wrong way? Well,
fret no more! Anyone can become a serial
killer! All you have to do is kill more than
one person and you make the cut! :D

What this mod does is offer a two fold gift.
It\'s in thanks for ridding the land of one
mouth peice it could do without and a tool
for taking out many, many more!

In order to get it, you need only pay the
small shipping and handling fee from Hell
Post Direct! Six human hearts, six pieces of
human flesh and six filled black soul gems.
(Grand souls please, but technically that
would just be a tip..)

What you get is the \"..ex vita libre,\" which
google tells me is \"..leave this life\" in Latin.
If anyone more educated than myself
knows this to be incorrect, please let me
know and I\'ll correct it. Not Spanish (which
is a fine language in all it\'s modulations,
don\'t get me wrong) but the old dead
language of Latin.

It\'s a translucent bow with ethereal flames
crackling all around it. I highly reccomend
enchanting it with \"magicka arrows,\" which
you can unlock with the fine work of
Mr./Miss (don\'t know) Blazie151:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29059/?

If you like it, let us know! It\'s not horribly
over powered, but provide us with your
first 1000 trophies (human skulls  - while we
absolutely love the souls you sent us, we\'re
oddly at a shortage of mason jars..) and the
bow that claimed them and we will send
you the \"Tenebrarum Amplexus.\" (The
Embrace of Darkness) It will one shot anyone
or anything on the continent! You will
feel and hear the difference before you fire
even your first arrow! It also has very
impressive range and is three times faster!

**************************************************************

Message to other modders:

You may call it trolling, but I call it a great
opportunity to learn stuff from people smarter
than me. Absolutely tell me what I\'m doing
wrong and how to \"doo it gooder!\" If you\'re
feeling particularly trolly that is.

I can say with a fair amount of certainty that
I have roughly 10% of the tallent of the second
crappiest modder who has ever lived. If I\'m wrong
about that, I\'m prolly being too generous. With
that being said, I\'m reading the forrums right now;
looking for answers to the following questions:

1. With Nif files who\'s textures are not included
(given by some other part of the game), how do
I manage to change the way they look? Blue
flames are cool, but not very Hell like in my mind.
Though I am 110% totally lacking in any kind of
\"belief\" of any kind, occult/tabboo stuff has
always had a special place in my heart because
of how much it pisses everyone else off.

2. Is there a bestiary of all the stuff in all the
drop down menus of the Creation Kit? Between
Yahoo and Google I can get by though.

3. How to add the unique enchantment magicka
arrows to this so it\'s there right out of the box,
yet players can also ad their own enchantments
to it at a table with no issues.

I used nothing but files that where already
available with the basic install sans DLC.

I play this game frequently, if you want to IM me,
I\'m \"Fumble Fett\" on Steam. I\'m always online so
shoot me a message if you want and don\'t worry
about bothering me.

I read the whole \"Terms and Conditions\" section
and it was pretty clear about \"teasing\" so I won\'t
get into what I\'ve got planned with this mod, but
I do plan on putting alot more work into it. Any
suggestions or help would be greatly appreciated.
author: Bethesda really - I only moved stuff around
